circumstances: During a night approach to Iron Mountain Airport, the pilot descended below the MDA when the twin engine airplane struck tree tops and crashed in a wooded area located few hundred yards short of runway threshold. The aircraft was destroyed and the pilot, sole on board, was killed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees on a night approach following improper IFR operation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Instruments misread or failed to read, 
- High obstructions,
- Descended below clearance limit of 3,000 feet.
